00070 bool Init() { 
00071         
00072         cout << "Initialising .. ";
00073     //Initialize SDL
00074     if( SDL_Init( SDL_INIT_EVERYTHING ) < 0 )  return false;
00075     if( SDL_SetVideoMode( SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, SCREEN_BPP, SDL_OPENGL ) == NULL )  return false;
00076     SDL_WM_SetCaption( "Game", NULL );
00077     //SDL_WM_GrabInput(SDL_GRAB_ON);
00078     SDL_ShowCursor(0);
00079     
00080     //Initialize OpenGL
00081     if( InitGL() == false ) return false;
00082 
00083     
00084     // load ship model
00085     try { 
00086         ship_model = new c3DSModel("data/ship1.3ds"); 
00087         block = new c3DSModel("data/block1.3ds"); 
00088         track = new c3DSModel("data/track1.3ds");
00089     } catch(string error_str) {
00090                 cerr << "Error: " << error_str << std::endl;
00091                 exit(1);
00092         }
00093     
00094     //set the global variables
00095     dtime = 0;
00096         bpm = 120;
00097         score = 0; 
00098     
00099     cout << "done." << endl;
00100     
00101     return true;    
00102 }

00104 bool InitGL() { 
00105         
00106         InitMode(RESET_MODE);
00107     
00108     //Set up a display list for drawing a quad
00109     dlDrawQuad = glGenLists(1); 
00110     glNewList(dlDrawQuad, GL_COMPILE); 
00111                         glBegin(GL_QUADS);
00112                           glTexCoord2f(1, 0);
00113                          glVertex3f( 1,-0.01,-1);
00114                           glTexCoord2f(1, 1);
00115                          glVertex3f( 1,-0.01, 1);
00116                           glTexCoord2f(0, 1);
00117                          glVertex3f(-1,-0.01, 1);
00118                           glTexCoord2f(0, 0);
00119                          glVertex3f(-1,-0.01,-1);
00120                         glEnd();
00121     glEndList();
00122         
00123         CheckErrors();
00124         
00125         glHint(GL_POLYGON_SMOOTH_HINT, GL_NICEST);
00126 
00127     return true;
